New Records: Paul Goldschmidt passes Joe DiMaggio on the all-time HR list with his 22nd home run of the season
Charlie Blackmon ties Carlos González for 5th on the Rockies' all-time home run list with his 227th home run
Key Match Events: Lars Nootbaar hits a solo home run
Paul Goldschmidt hits a home run
Charlie Blackmon hits a two-run home run
Iván Herrera hits a solo home run
Pedro Pagés hits a two-run home run
Ezequiel Tovar hits a game-tying two-run double
Ryan McMahon hits a go-ahead RBI double
Michael Toglia hits an RBI double
Seth Halvorsen closes out the game for a 10-8 victory
